thread.title: Australia PM bans sex between ministers and staff

title: Australia PM bans sex between ministers and staff
text:
Australia PM bans sex between ministers and staff 10:26am GMT - 01:16 
Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull on Thursday banned sex between ministers and staff and rounded on his deputy for a “shocking error of judgment” by having an affair with a press secretary. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull on Thursday banned sex between ministers and staff and rounded on his deputy for a “shocking error of judgment” by having an affair with a press secretary.
